name: Chill Granny
description:
Chill, Granny! is a runner clicker game where you have to create shields with your mouse to protect your character from harm! 

When, during a cold winter, the powerful Fire Granny takes all the yarn for herself, it is up to Ice Granny to take the yarn back and defend herself from the fire balls her opponent throws at her! Beware of the icicles on the ceiling as well, they might knock the blocks right on you!

Controls: 

Click on the "Abrakadabra" Button to create an ice block and then press spawn with the mouse to make it appear on the screen.
